title: Who know how to solve PBE shop problem?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I have 0 RP and 0 BE so i don't know what to do, Shop button don't work, Loot same don't work, Match History don't work. Can someone tell me how to solve this.
Loot says : Loot is temporarily disabled. Please check the servis status for more information.
If you know please let the comment down .

replies.body: The store should be back up at this point, but the [**status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) still lists Loot as being disabled for the time being.
And i have same problem i will just w8 they to fix it {{champion:105}}
im having the same problem and i have no idea what to do, and ive tried everything!!{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
